Detect Configuration File Source

Source: R/config_loader.R
detect_config_source.Rd

Determines where a config file would be loaded from without loading it. Returns a list with source type and path.

Usage

detect_config_source(
  file_path = NULL,
  file_name = NULL,
  package_subdir = "extdata"
)

Arguments

file_path

Explicit path to file (highest priority)

file_name

Base filename to search for

package_subdir

Subdirectory in package inst/

Value

List with source ("explicit", "project", "wd", "package") and path
